title: Ep 3: Advice. Passions, Promotions, + More.
itunes:title: Ep 3: Advice. Passions, Promotions, + More.
description:
It's our first advice session! This week, Grace & Becca are answering a few of your career related questions. The ladies discuss taking a passion project/hobby and turning it into a career, asking for a promotion or more money at work, what they would have done differently right after college, + more. Plus, they also chat about current self care favorites (do you have a gravity blanket yet??), their favorite instagram accounts right now, + the highs and lows of the week.

If you haven't already, pick up next week's book - One of Us is Lying. 

And if you have a question for a future episode, send us an email - youngadultingpod@gmail.com

In the meantime, loving Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

And leave us a review in iTunes!
content:encoded:
It's our first advice session! This week, Grace & Becca are answering a few of your career related questions. The ladies discuss taking a passion project/hobby and turning it into a career, asking for a promotion or more money at work, what they would have done differently right after college, + more. Plus, they also chat about current self care favorites (do you have a gravity blanket yet??), their favorite instagram accounts right now, + the highs and lows of the week.

If you haven't already, pick up next week's book - One of Us is Lying.
